title: New CHP plant will make Moy Park's Craigavon facility twice as energy efficient - The Irish News
published_parsed: time.struct_time(tm_year=2023, tm_mon=4, tm_mday=13, tm_hour=7, tm_min=0, tm_sec=0, tm_wday=3, tm_yday=103, tm_isdst=0)
summary: New CHP plant will make Moy Park's Craigavon facility twice as energy efficient  The Irish News
title_detail.value: New CHP plant will make Moy Park's Craigavon facility twice as energy efficient - The Irish News
summary_detail.value: New CHP plant will make Moy Park's Craigavon facility twice as energy efficient  The Irish News
source.title: The Irish News
text: FOOD processing giant Moy Park has installed a new state-of-the-art combined heat and power (CHP) unit at its Craigavon facility, bringing substantial efficiency and sustainability benefits and moving it closer to its net zero goal. Delivered and installed by Centrica Business Solutions, the new unit uses natural gas to generate electricity and hot water at the site, with its exhaust gases also used to feed into a heat recovery generator to provide steam. It means CHP technology is over twice as efficient as conventional power sources. It is the latest in a series of measures Moy Park is taking to improve energy efficiency and meet its target of net zero greenhouse gas emissions across its operations by 2040. Alongside investment in emissions reduction projects in Moy Park owned facilities, the company is investing in research and development projects to strengthen and scale regenerative farming practices and is committed to reducing water use intensity by 15 per cent by 2030 and have 100 per cent renewable energy across the business by 2025. Moy Park general manager Nompilo Sibanda said: “We have a responsibility to produce quality food in the most sustainable way and to reduce our impact on the environment. “This responsibility is something we take very seriously, and across business we are taking action to make our processes more energy efficient and sustainable. “The investment at Craigavon will ensure energy savings, and we are grateful to the team at Centrica for their partnership and collaboration in delivering this project.” She added: “Our journey to net zero emissions by 2040 is ongoing and this is just one of many investments we are making to reach our sustainability goals. We are collaborating closely with partners to ensure our processes across the business and across the supply chain are more sustainable and bring us closer to our net zero target.” Justin Jacober, director of Centrica Business Solutions UK & Ireland, said: “CHP isn’t just an energy-efficient solution; it’s also a smart one. It allows businesses like Moy Park to produce heat and power from the same fuel, delivering cost savings, environmental benefits and energy security, all in one package. “With net zero commitments driving change across Moy Park’s operations, the new unit is a milestone on its journey to net zero greenhouse gas emissions. And, with the food and drink industry facing challenges from increased production costs and supply chain issues, improved energy efficiency is more important than ever.” Centrica Business Solutions has provided a consolidated full wrap package for the company, acting as investor, manufacturer, installer, and service provider that guarantees performance for the life of the system.

title: AG unveils new £3m factory in Fivemiletown, but confirms closure of Moy site - The Irish News
published_parsed: time.struct_time(tm_year=2023, tm_mon=4, tm_mday=20, tm_hour=7, tm_min=0, tm_sec=0, tm_wday=3, tm_yday=110, tm_isdst=0)
summary: AG unveils new £3m factory in Fivemiletown, but confirms closure of Moy site  The Irish News
title_detail.value: AG unveils new £3m factory in Fivemiletown, but confirms closure of Moy site - The Irish News
summary_detail.value: AG unveils new £3m factory in Fivemiletown, but confirms closure of Moy site  The Irish News
source.title: The Irish News
text: AG has offically unveiled its new £3 million factory in Fivemiletown, where the paving specialist is headquartered. PAVING and building product manufacturer AG has unveiled its new £3 million factory in Fivemiletown. But the Co Tyrone group, formerly known as Acheson & Glover, has confirmed the closure of its site between Dungannon and Moy. Manufacturing ceased at the Old Moy Road site last year. But the company said the site had now closed completely “as part of a wider consolidation of its sales and administration function”. The ‘Outside Room’ retail aspect of the Moy site is to be replaced with a new retail facility within JP Corrys in Dromore, Co Down. AG said there have been no redundancies with staff offered relocation options within the business. Manufacturing ceased at AG's Old Moy Road site last year. The location has now closed completely. (Image: Google) Acheson & Glover has undergone significant restructuring in recent years. A difficult trading period in 2018 led to the collapse of its precast division. But the renewed focus on paving products in recent years appears to have paid dividends for the business. Speaking as he unofficially unveiled the group’s new factory in Fivemiletown, AG chief executive Stephen Acheson said the company had experienced “unprecedented demand” for its paving products over the past number of years in both commercial and domestic sectors. "This new facility will significantly increase our production capacity allowing us to produce more products to keep up with demand levels - helping us to satisfy new and existing customers,” he said. AG said new Fivemiletown factory will produce a wide range of flagstones for customers in both Ireland and the UK. The investment in the site includes technology geared at increasing performance efficiency while, improving health and safety and helping cut the firm’s carbon footprint. “At AG we remain committed to producing the best products for all our customers,” continued Mr Acheson. “Our continued investment in facilities and new technology will ensure continued quality, higher productivity, and improved energy efficiency. “We have expanded our product portfolio whilst maintaining our determination to always manufacture products that are better, faster and safer.”

source.title: Inventiva
text: INTRODUCTION Nanotechnology is a field of science and technology focusing on engineering and manipulating matter at extremely small scales — often as small as just one atom. This makes it possible to create materials, devices, and systems with unique and improved properties not found in naturally occurring materials. In the US, nanotechnology has become an increasingly important part of many industries, such as healthcare, electronics, textiles, energy, construction materials, and food. The US is home to some of the world’s most advanced and innovative nanotechnology companies. Companies such as NanoMech, Nanosys, Nantero, Carbon nanoMaterials, Nanofiber Solutions, Nanogate, Nano-Tex, and Nanoxplore are all leading nanotech innovators. NanoMech utilizes nanotechnology to develop new solutions for manufacturing, including wear-resistant coatings, dry lubricants, and performance additives. Nanosys creates advanced materials and products for use in computing, communications, and energy applications. Nantero develops advanced carbon nanotube-based memory components that offer improved speed and power efficiency for computers. Carbon nanoMaterials focuses on producing high-purity nanomaterials for use in research and industry. Nanofiber Solutions specializes in creating nanofibers used in personal care products, medical devices, filtration systems, and other applications. Nanogate develops innovative nanostructured materials to improve the performance of products across many industries. Nano-Tex creates nanotextile technologies for apparel, accessories, and upholstery. And finally, Nanoxplore manufactures lithium-ion batteries that are smaller, lighter, and longer lasting than traditional lithium-ion batteries. IMPORTANCE In 2023, nanotechnology will be a critical component of many businesses in the United States. Its potential to radically improve products and services across industries has already been widely recognized and discussed. Companies are increasingly investing in the research and development of nanotech solutions, as well as developing strategies to leverage these advantages. Nanotechnology involves manipulating matter at the nano-scale — meaning particles that measure one billionth of a meter. At this scale, materials can have unique properties compared to larger scales, such as increased strength, increased electrical conductivity, or an increased ability to store data. As a result, nanotechnology has found applications in fields such as computing, energy storage, biomedicine, and environmental protection. In the US, nanotechnology companies are playing a leading role in driving innovation and providing solutions in fields ranging from healthcare and agriculture to electronics and industrial manufacturing. Companies like Nanosys, NanoString Technologies, and Nanometrics are pioneering the development of nanotech-based products and systems with the goal of bringing them to market quicker and at lower costs. Nanotechnology is also becoming increasingly important to corporations and government agencies as they seek to enhance their competitiveness in the global marketplace. The US Department of Defense, for example, has created a program called “Designing Materials to Revolutionize and Engineer our Future”, which seeks to use nanotechnology for a wide range of military applications. Similarly, the National Science Foundation is funding a project to develop nanotech-based sensors for use in national security operations. The potential for nanotechnology to revolutionize how we live and do business is clear. Innovative nanotechnology companies in the US are leading the charge, developing solutions that will shape the way we work and interact in the years to come. Here are the top 10 best nanotechnology companies in USA in 2023 IBM NanoTech Solutions – IBM Nanotech Solutions is a technology company that specializes in the development, manufacture and commercialization of nanotechnology products. The company’s mission is to develop innovative solutions to enable the next generation of technology products. They focus on developing novel materials and processes that enable new levels of performance and increased efficiency. The company has developed a wide range of nano-enabled products, from advanced materials for electronics to computer components and even medical devices. These products are designed to increase performance, reduce costs and enhance safety. IBM Nanotech Solutions also offers customized services for businesses that require specialized nanotechnology solutions. IBM Nanotech Solutions focuses on creating sustainable, high-performance materials and systems that have potential applications in many industries. Their research and development efforts focus on developing innovative nanotechnology solutions for energy storage, medical diagnostics, information technology and telecommunications. IBM Nanotech Solutions has several active research groups in the areas of nano-electronics, bio-nanotechnology and nanomedicine. Their scientists are working to create new materials and processes that can improve the performance of existing technologies or even enable entirely new ones. In addition, they are developing environmentally friendly nanomaterials that can be used to reduce pollution and conserve resources. IBM Nanotech Solutions is committed to providing its customers with the best possible products and services. They strive to be a leader in the industry, striving to develop cutting-edge products while maintaining ethical standards and a responsible approach to business. They are committed to delivering superior results and creating value for their customers. Intel Nanotechnology – Intel Nanotechnology Company is an international leader in developing and delivering nanotechnology solutions for a variety of commercial sectors. Their products range from computer microprocessors and memory to advanced medical devices and materials, precision optics, and quantum computing technology. Intel’s nanotechnology focuses on creating new materials, components, and systems that are able to interact with each other at the nanoscale level. Intel has developed a variety of nanotechnology-based products, including nanoscale transistors, photonic crystals, nanomaterials, nanoelectromechanical systems (NEMS) and molecular electronics. These products are capable of operating at extremely small scales, enabling them to process data faster and more accurately than ever before. Intel’s nanotechnology also allows for the development of miniaturized sensors and medical devices, as well as improved energy efficiency and storage. Intel’s nanotechnology advances have been used in many different industries, from healthcare and consumer electronics to defence, aerospace, automotive, and manufacturing. The company has developed a number of groundbreaking nanotechnology products, such as ultra-thin and lightweight laptops, high-sensitivity cancer detectors, miniaturized fuel cells, and next-generation optical devices. The potential for Intel’s nanotechnology extends far beyond what we see today. With continued research, Intel could develop new applications for nanotechnology, which will revolutionize how we use and interact with technology. Intel’s nanotechnology could revolutionize how we think about our digital world, reshaping how people live and work. Applied Materials – Applied Materials is a leading global provider of innovative materials engineering solutions for the semiconductor, display and solar photovoltaic industries. Founded in 1967, Applied Materials has grown to become a Fortune 500 company with approximately 27,000 employees in over 150 countries around the world. The company’s mission is to “innovate and accelerate materials science to provide customers with superior value and performance.” Applied Materials provides a wide range of products and services that enable the development and manufacture of high-performance chips, displays and solar cells used in consumer electronics, optical communications, medical imaging and other applications. The company’s offerings include process technology, deposition systems, etch systems, metrology, inspection systems, and cleaning technologies, as well as a suite of related software, service and support capabilities. Applied Materials also partners with third parties to develop and commercialize new products. In addition to its core business, Applied Materials also invests in innovative research and development projects. Its applied venture capital arm, Applied Ventures, has played a role in the success of numerous start-ups, including several unicorns. Applied also maintains active collaborations with many universities and scientific research institutes. Applied Materials has earned a reputation for operational excellence. Its management team is highly experienced, with decades of collective experience in the materials engineering industry. The company’s commitment to continuous improvement has been recognized on multiple occasions, most recently by Fortune magazine, which named Applied Materials one of the World’s Most Admired Companies in 2021. Applied Materials continues to strive to be a leader in materials science. The company’s vision is to create sustainable value through innovation, collaboration and customer focus – helping to make the world a better place. American Superconductor Corporation – American Superconductor Corporation is a leading global provider of advanced energy technologies, products and services. Founded in 1987, the company designs and manufactures innovative power delivery solutions that improve grid reliability, efficiency, safety, and environmental impact. Its products include high-temperature superconductors (HTS), medium-voltage power systems, power electronics and energy management solutions. The company also provides engineering and consulting services for the development of HTS-based solutions. American Superconductor’s products are used in many industries, including electric utilities, industrial motors, wind turbines, and medical imaging systems. The company operates across four major business units: Energy Technologies, Power Systems, Electrical Infrastructure, and Services. The company’s headquarters are located in Westborough, Massachusetts, with offices around the world. American Superconductor is publicly traded on the NASDAQ under the symbol AMSC. DuPont Electronics & Communications – Dupont Electronics & Communications Company is a global leader in technology and innovation. Founded in 1959, the company specializes in providing innovative solutions for communication, entertainment, healthcare, safety, transportation and more. The company’s products are used by governments, corporations, and individuals all over the world. Dupont Electronics & Communications Company has built a reputation as a trusted partner that provides quality products and services. For communication purposes, the company offers a variety of products, such as telephones, radios, wireless networks, and satellite systems. Their radios and telephone systems have become widely popular due to their low cost, reliability and quality. Dupont also provides data, voice, and video services over the internet using their own satellites, routers, and servers. For entertainment, Dupont manufactures televisions, stereos, DVD players, and other audio-visual equipment. They offer an extensive library of digital media, including movies, TV shows, music, games, and more. In the healthcare sector, Dupont produces medical equipment and other life-saving devices. Their products are designed to improve patient care, reduce costs, and increase efficiency for hospitals, clinics, and medical labs. In the transportation industry, Dupont produces components for automobiles and aircraft. These products include sensors, actuators, electronic systems, and more. Finally, Dupont produces a wide range of products for safety and security. Their products are designed to protect people, property, and information from various threats. Overall, Dupont Electronics & Communications Company is a reliable and trustworthy provider of cutting-edge solutions for communication, entertainment, healthcare, safety, and transportation. With years of experience in the industry, they have earned the trust of many customers around the world. Nanometrics – Nanometrics is a leading provider of innovative metrology and process control solutions that enable manufacturers to measure, monitor, and control their processes. Founded in 2002, the company has a long history of providing high-precision, comprehensive, and reliable metrology and process control solutions for the semiconductor industry. Nanometrics products are designed to meet the stringent requirements of both silicon and compound semiconductor manufacturing processes. Their products include metrology systems such as optical microscopes, scanning electron microscopes, atomic force microscopes, X-ray diffraction systems, and more. They also offer process control tools such as thin film deposition systems, etchers, chemical-mechanical polishers, and others. Additionally, Nanometrics offers a range of software solutions that allow manufacturers to monitor and control their production processes from anywhere in the world. All of these products and services enable manufacturers to optimize their production yields and reduce their costs. Nanometrics is committed to developing and delivering advanced, cost-effective solutions that help customers improve their operations. Nanosys – Nanosys is a cutting-edge nanotechnology company founded in 2021. With the mission to reimagine the world with nanoscale systems, Nanosys has become a leader in the field of nanotechnology research and development. The company is dedicated to leveraging the power of nanotechnology to create disruptive solutions for industries such as healthcare, energy, and the environment. Nanosys uses nanomaterials to create breakthrough products and technologies that can solve pressing global issues. Their products are made up of tiny particles, molecules, and structures that are billions of times smaller than human hair. This allows them to access otherwise impossible levels of complexity and control over molecular behaviour and interactions. Nanosys has already developed groundbreaking products such as nanosensors for medical diagnostics, nanomagnets for high-efficiency power generation, and nanofluids for improved cooling performance. By taking advantage of nanostructures, they are able to make these products more efficient, accurate, and safe than ever before. In addition to its product development, Nanosys also focuses on the development of new nano-manufacturing processes. They invest heavily in research and development to explore the potential of nanotechnology and its applications in the real world. Nanosys prides itself on hiring the best and brightest minds in the industry and working closely with universities, research centres, and other partners to further their knowledge in nanotechnology. Their commitment to excellence drives them to continue pushing the boundaries of what is possible in the field. The future of nanotechnology looks bright, and Nanosys is leading the charge. With its dedication to innovation and expertise in nanotechnology, Nanosys is positioning itself to be at the forefront of the next wave of technological advancements that will shape the world of tomorrow. NanoMech – Nanomech is a technology company based in San Francisco, California. Founded by a group of scientists and entrepreneurs in 2021, Nanomech specializes in nanotechnology, artificial intelligence and advanced robotics. Their goal is to develop small-scale robots that can be used for a variety of tasks, including medical diagnostics, search and rescue, and industrial production. Nanomech produces tiny machines on the scale of nanometers, with parts that are as small as individual atoms. These machines are incredibly precise, and able to perform intricate tasks with the utmost accuracy. They use sophisticated AI algorithms to understand their environment, enabling them to identify objects and respond to commands quickly and accurately. Nanomech robots are also equipped with sensors, allowing them to detect minute changes in their environment. The company’s flagship product is the Nanobot, a tiny robotic device capable of performing a wide range of tasks. The Nanobot is designed to operate autonomously, using its AI algorithms to make decisions and complete tasks without human intervention. It has been used in a variety of applications, from laboratory research to medical diagnostics. Nanomech also offers a range of services that offer customers access to their technology. This includes consulting services that help businesses integrate the Nanobot into their operations, as well as training courses for those interested in developing their own applications. In addition to its products and services, Nanomech also runs an incubator program for start-ups interested in developing applications for their technology. Through this program, start-ups can access funding, mentorship, and other resources to help them develop their projects. Overall, Nanomech is a cutting-edge company devoted to developing new technologies that will revolutionize how we interact with the world around us. From robotics to artificial intelligence, Nanomech is pushing the boundaries of what’s possible. Nanostructures, Inc. – Nanostructures, Inc. is a leading innovator in the field of nanotechnology and nanomaterials. Founded in 2021, the company has quickly become one of the most successful players in the industry. Nanostructures, Inc. specializes in the research and development of novel nanostructures and nanomaterials for use in various applications, including energy storage, data processing, and device fabrication. The company’s R&D team is composed of top-tier researchers from all over the world, representing a wide range of disciplines. This team is at the forefront of nanoscopic research and has produced groundbreaking advances in the field of nanotechnology. Through its innovative approaches to nanomaterials production, Nanostructures, Inc. has earned a reputation for delivering products that meet the highest standards of quality and performance. In addition to its cutting-edge research projects, Nanostructures, Inc. also provides consulting services to other businesses. These services include custom nanostructure creation and design, as well as the implementation of nanotechnology in existing industries. The company has already developed partnerships with several major companies, including Microsoft, Intel, and Apple, among others. At the heart of Nanostructures, Inc. are its employees. All employees of the company adhere to the core values of integrity, innovation, and collaboration. The company encourages its employees to bring their unique skills and expertise to the table, allowing them to make a real contribution to the success of the organization. Furthermore, Nanostructures, Inc. invests heavily in employee development and training, ensuring that its staff remain up-to-date with the latest technologies and advancements in the field. In summary, Nanostructures, Inc. is a highly successful company dedicated to the research and development of nanomaterials and nanostructures. Leveraging the collective talents of its talented team of researchers, the company has produced numerous breakthroughs that have revolutionized the field of nanotechnology. In addition, the company has established strong partnerships with some of the world’s leading companies while investing heavily in the development of its own employees. Nano-Terra Corporation – Nano-Terra Corporation is a leading nanotechnology research and development company focused on advancing the commercial applications of nanotechnology. Established in 2021, Nano-Terra has quickly become a leader in the field through cutting-edge research and innovative products. Nano-Terra provides solutions to many industries, from healthcare to automotive, and their expertise spans multiple disciplines, including chemistry, physics, materials sciences and engineering. They specialize in developing highly advanced nanomaterials and nanodevices for diverse fields such as drug delivery, energy storage, biomedical devices and advanced sensing systems. The company has a strong commitment to sustainability, evidenced by its extensive network of partnerships with universities, research institutes, corporations and governments. Their mission is to use their expertise to solve problems, create opportunities, and improve lives. Nano-Terra has established itself as an innovator in nanotechnology through its pioneering work on nano-electronic systems, molecular electronics, nanomotors and nanoscale actuators. The company’s researchers have developed advanced nanomaterials that are used in medical diagnostic devices, biofuel cells, drug delivery systems and fuel cells. In addition, they are working on projects to develop novel technologies for clean energy applications and storage. Nano-Terra has also been involved in a number of collaborative projects with other companies and universities around the world. These collaborations have produced various inventions and patents, as well as numerous awards and accolades. The company continues to push the boundaries of nanotechnology and is committed to creating more efficient, cost-effective and sustainable technologies. In the future, Nano-Terra will continue to innovate and drive progress in the field of nanotechnology so that it can be used for the betterment of humanity. CONCLUSION In 2023, nanotechnology companies in the US have seen impressive growth and development. Companies such as Nanosense, Nanotech Solutions, and NanoLab are leading the way in the US market, offering innovative solutions to industrial and medical problems. These companies are using nanotechnology to create tiny particles that can be used to produce advanced materials, create new drugs, and even detect and treat diseases. Additionally, advances in nanotechnology are providing a foundation for developing clean energy sources and improving water filtration systems. With the continued advancements in nanotechnology, experts predict that these companies will only continue to grow and expand over the next decade and beyond.
